response.overview: Siege is a short, filmed character monologue exploring what it means to be disabled and ‘looked at'. Mim, performed by the brilliant Philippa Coles, is a funny, edgy radical, trying to live a subversive lifestyle right slap bang in the middle of the radar, with a shame-free approach to the disabled female body, who can’t get a gig. What’s it gonna take to change that?
response.title: Siege
